title: 'Your shop' does not work.
body: When i try to buy a special offer including Lucian and his project skin it says an unexpected error has occoured. I cant buy it I even tried relogging but it did not work.

replies.body:
Hey there,

I believe this is an issue that occurs when you try to purchase a skin from your shop without owning the champion, do you own lucian?
what could possibly solve my problem then?

Purchase him seperately, for IP if possible.

Or consider [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support, as they may be able to assist you further.

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=PU4ntplz,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-06-11T23:33:49.965+0000)
>
> Purchase him seperately, for IP if possible.
> 
> Or consider [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support, as they may be able to assist you further.
 
I would really not like to purchase him for IP, because this offer is really a bargain and I have already purchased RP to buy it. I have already submitted a support ticket, but they did not really succeed in solving my problem.
No, i don't own him. The offer, which i am trying to purchase includes him and his PROJECT skin.
